text: I have an odd behavior on my unit test, it seems that the `export` s from my package are not working. If call `MyStruct(x,y,z)`  I get an error that `MyStruct` is not define. But, if I use `MyPackage.MyStruct(x, y, z)` the test works. I checked and my package exports `export MyStruct` at the end and I am using `using MyPackage` on `runtests.jl`. Any idea on how to troubleshoot this?
